system.notes: When attack blocked, roll 1d10 for  direction and move 2d10 metres, emerge on solid ground in empty space. If Direction and distance dice roll same number (EG 3 7's), user does not emerge for 1d5 rounds, gains 1 Corruption. If wearer was Suprised when this happens, forfeits next turn in shock.
